text:
RT @mlevenson: Five former guards and a nurse at a North Carolina jail have been charged with involuntary manslaughter in the death of a Black man, John Neville, 56, who pleaded, "I can't breathe," as the officers tried unsuccessfully to remove his handcuffs.
